## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's code style
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have added or updated relevant documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Security
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, passwords, etc.) is included
- [ ] Input validation is implemented where applicable
- [ ] Security best practices are followed
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities introduced

### Dependencies
- [ ] No new dependencies added, OR
- [ ] New dependencies are necessary and have been reviewed for security
- [ ] `build.spm.kts` updated if dependencies changed

### Localization
- [ ] Strings are externalized to `strings.xml` (not hardcoded)
- [ ] Hindi translations added to `values-hi/strings.xml` (if applicable)
- [ ] Text is properly displayed in both languages

### Performance
- [ ] No performance regressions introduced
- [ ] Memory leaks checked (if applicable)
- [ ] Network calls are optimized (if applicable)
